title: Blitzcrank moves at Mach 5.
body: Please reduce him back to Mach 4 so I don't have to waste my whole life trying to kill him and since Frozen Mallet is like viable 1 game out of ten thousand.

replies.body: Would have to agree- either his move speed or insane damage+silence is pretty bullshit. The fact that once he catches up to you (after you flashed, took a thresh lantern and used ghost) and once he grabs you (inevitable unless you are leblanc) you are not only cc'd but SILENCED. SO YOU CAN'T INVUN, YOU CAN'T ZONYAS. NOTHING. OH AND HIS COMBO DID 800 DMG
